title: "We ran into an error loading your clubs; try relogging to reload."
body: I keep getting this error and I keep relogging but it doesn't fix it. Its still there, anyone know what to do?

replies.body:
Still not working for me :) 
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

How long is this going to take? I own a club of 36 members, and we all play together frequently. We rely greatly upon this club to connect with each other. Why is it taking so long to fix this? I'm not angry, but it is quite frustrating.

I was under the impression this was fixed a while ago. I just posted the same issue today. In my case I have the old client and it only started at Pre-Season 7 patch. Been about two months without being able to access my clubs. :(

Is this going to fix or no? 4 months are a lot of time to fix it, so, do I should hope that will be fixed or not, just to know, it will be easy if riot says that option will not be avalible anymore...

we ran into an error loading your clubs reload and try again.
what do i do to fix being like this for 2weeks
There's currently an issue with clubs per our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na).  Keep the page bookmarked to keep an eye out for updates.  Hang tight until ti's all fixed up!

Hey I'm still having this issue even though there isn't anything mentioned on the service status page. My old club disappeared but I still have a club tag displaying in game from another club I was in before the clubs disappeared. Any help?
Are you dam n idiots people? Riot just turned off clubs and maybe they will never turn this back on again. To fix this issue 5 minutes is needed.
Same  relogging    > what  ?
Yup. I miss my club :/
SAME. Started 3 hours ago. Please fix this! And please up the club limit to 200 or something :p
"We are aware of the issues with clubs and are working on a fix" - Should be fixed soon hopefully!
i have this same problem i just now i looked an i relogged in many times still isnt resolved riot please help
Same thing with my account, really annoying

I am having this issue as well. I have relogged, reboooted, and reinstalled client. Nothing has helped yet, and I've only been getting this issue within the last few hours.

Does anyone have a fix?
SAME
same
Same here please help its really annoying, relogged so many times still an error.{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
Same here ... apparently people had this problem a few months ago and the patch fixed it :/
I just started getting it.
Same problem here. Just started happening today.
